Class ClientCore

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client_core.ClientCore
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientCore extends AbstractClient
Core client class that handles communication with the server and provides methods for various client operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientCore(String host, int port)
    Constructs a new ClientCore instance and opens a connection to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientCore

      public ClientCore(String host, int port) throws IOException
      Constructs a new ClientCore instance and opens a connection to the server.
      Parameters:
      host - The server host address.
      port - The server port number.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the connection cannot be established.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> createUser(String name, String password, String email, String phone)
      Sends a request to create a new user.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      phone - The phone number of the user.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the response code and description.

    • getCurrentParkingStatus

      public javafx.util.Pair<List<Map<String,String>>, String> getCurrentParkingStatus()
      Retrieves the current parking status from the server.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the list of parking data and a description.

    • getReport

      public javafx.util.Pair<List<Map<String,String>>, Integer> getReport(String type, String month, String year)
      Retrieves a report from the server based on the specified type, month, and year.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the report ("PARKING" or "USERS").
      month - The month of the report.
      year - The year of the report.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the report data and the response code.

    • depositVehicle

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> depositVehicle(String subscriberId, String orderNumber)
      Sends a request to deposit a vehicle.
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      orderNumber - The order number associated with the deposit.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the response code and description.

    • reserveParking

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> reserveParking(String subscriberId, String orderDate, String orderTime)
      Sends a request to reserve a parking spot.
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      orderDate - The date of the reservation.
      orderTime - The time of the reservation.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the response code and description.

    • pickup

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> pickup(String subscriberId, String confirmationCode)
      Sends a request to pick up a vehicle.
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      confirmationCode - The parking confirmation code.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the response code and description.

    • extendParking

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> extendParking(String subscriberId, String confirmationCode)
      Sends a request to extend a parking reservation.
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - The ID of the subscriber.
      confirmationCode - The parking confirmation code.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the response code and description.

    • editUserDetails

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> editUserDetails(String email, String password, String phone)
      Sends an EDIT_USER command to the server to update the subscriber's details. Waits for a response containing a result code and description.
      Parameters:
      email - The new email address to set for the subscriber.
      password - The new password to set.
      phone - The new phone number to set.
      Returns:
      A Pair containing: - Integer: response code (e.g., 200 for success, 503/504 for error), - String: description or error message.

    • logIn

      public javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String> logIn(String email, String password, boolean forceLogin)
      Sends a LOGIN command to the server with the provided email and password. Waits for the server's response and processes it to determine login success.
      Parameters:
      email - The subscriber's email address.
      password - The subscriber's password.
      Returns:
      A Pair containing: - Integer: status code (e.g., 200 for success, 503/504 for errors), - String: description or error message from the server.

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Sends a LOGOUT command to the server and closes the client connection. This method ensures the logout request is sent before disconnecting.

    • getUserHistory

      public List<Map<String,String>> getUserHistory(String userId)
      Retrieves the user history from the server.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose history is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing the user history data.

    • RecoverUser

      public Map<Integer, List<String>> RecoverUser(String userId)
      Sends a RECOVER command to the server to retrieve subscriber information (e.g., for lost credentials). Waits for a response and returns the result mapped by the response code.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user attempting to recover their information.
      Returns:
      A Map where the key is the server's response code and the value is a list containing: - subscriber name - subscriber email - subscriber phone - parking confirmation code (if any) Returns null on error or timeout.

    • getSubscriberId

      public String getSubscriberId()
      Returns:
      The subscriber ID of the currently logged-in user.

    • getSubscriberName

      public String getSubscriberName()
      Returns:
      The name of the currently logged-in subscriber.

    • getSubscriberStatus

      public String getSubscriberStatus()
      Returns:
      The subscription status of the current subscriber (e.g., active, frozen).

    • getSubscriberEmail

      public String getSubscriberEmail()
      Returns:
      The email address of the current subscriber.

    • getSubscriberPhone

      public String getSubscriberPhone()
      Returns:
      The phone number of the current subscriber.

    • getSubscriberPassword

      public String getSubscriberPassword()
      Returns:
      The password of the current subscriber.

    • showRawTable

      public void showRawTable(List<Map<String,String>> tb)
      Prints each row of the given table (List of maps) in raw format. Useful for debugging or inspecting server responses.
      Parameters:
      tb - The table to print.
